# MediaVault v2 - Complete Category Reference

## 📂 All 9 Main Categories

### 🎵 1. Music
**Use for**: Music videos, albums, songs, live performances

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] music mp3
./download.sh [URL] music mp4
```

**Structure**:
```
Music/
└── 2026-01-13 - Artist - Song Name/
    ├── Artist - Song Name.mp3
    ├── Artist - Song Name.info.json
    └── Artist - Song Name.jpg
```

---

### 🎙️ 2. Podcasts
**Use for**: Podcast episodes, audio shows, talk shows

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] podcast mp3
```

**Structure**:
```
Podcasts/
└── 2026-01-13 - Podcast Name Episode Title/
    ├── episode.mp3
    ├── episode.info.json
    └── episode.description
```

---

### 📚 3. Tutorials
**Use for**: How-to videos, courses, educational guides, coding tutorials

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] tutorial mp4
./download.sh [URL] tutorial both
```

**Structure**:
```
Tutorials/
└── 2026-01-13 - Python Full Course for Beginners/
    ├── course.mp4
    ├── course.mp3 (if "both")
    ├── course.srt
    └── course.info.json
```

---

### 🎬 4. Entertainment
**Use for**: Movies, TV shows, comedy specials, entertainment content

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] entertainment mp4
```

**Structure**:
```
Entertainment/
└── 2026-01-13 - Movie Name/
    ├── movie.mp4
    ├── movie.srt
    └── movie.info.json
```

---

### 🎓 5. Educational
**Use for**: Lectures, academic content, documentaries, talks

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] educational mp4
```

**Structure**:
```
Educational/
└── 2026-01-13 - MIT Lecture - Topic/
    ├── lecture.mp4
    ├── lecture.srt
    └── lecture.info.json
```

---

### 🎥 6. Documentaries
**Use for**: Documentary films, docuseries, nature documentaries

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] documentary mp4
```

**Structure**:
```
Documentaries/
└── 2026-01-13 - Nature Documentary Name/
    ├── documentary.mp4
    ├── documentary.srt
    └── documentary.info.json
```

---

### 🗣️ 7. Interviews
**Use for**: Interviews, talks, discussions, Q&A sessions

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] interview mp4
./download.sh [URL] interview mp3
```

**Structure**:
```
Interviews/
└── 2026-01-13 - Person Name Interview/
    ├── interview.mp4
    ├── interview.mp3 (if audio)
    └── interview.info.json
```

---

### 📱 8. Shortform
**Use for**: TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, viral clips, memes

**Commands**:
```bash
# By platform
./download.sh [URL] shortform-tiktok mp4
./download.sh [URL] shortform-reels mp4
./download.sh [URL] shortform-shorts mp4

# By creator (auto-organizes)
./download.sh [URL] shortform-creator mp4
```

**Structure (By Platform)**:
```
Shortform/
├── TikTok/2026-01/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - video title.mp4
├── Reels/2026-01/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - reel title.mp4
└── YouTubeShorts/2026-01/
    └── 2026-01-13 - short title.mp4
```

**Structure (By Creator)**:
```
Shortform/ByCreator/
├── @khaby.lame/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - video.mp4
├── @gordonramsay/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - recipe.mp4
└── @zendaya/
    └── 2026-01-13 - post.mp4
```

**Special Features**:
- ✅ Automatic monthly folders (prevents clutter)
- ✅ Creator-based organization option
- ✅ Perfect for bulk downloads

---

### 📦 9. Other
**Use for**: Everything else that doesn't fit above categories

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] other mp4
```

**Structure**:
```
Other/
└── 2026-01-13 - Video Title/
    ├── video.mp4
    └── video.info.json
```

---

## 🎯 Quick Decision Guide

**"Where should this go?"**

| Content | Category |
|---------|----------|
| Music video, album, song | `music` |
| Podcast episode | `podcast` |
| How-to video, course | `tutorial` |
| Movie, TV show, comedy | `entertainment` |
| Lecture, academic talk | `educational` |
| Documentary film | `documentary` |
| Interview, discussion | `interview` |
| TikTok video | `shortform-tiktok` |
| Instagram Reel | `shortform-reels` |
| YouTube Short | `shortform-shorts` |
| Anything else | `other` |

---

## 📊 File Type Defaults

| Category | Default Type | Recommended Type |
|----------|--------------|------------------|
| Music | mp3 | mp3 (smaller) |
| Podcasts | mp3 | mp3 (audio only) |
| Tutorials | mp3 | mp4 or both |
| Entertainment | mp3 | mp4 |
| Educational | mp3 | mp4 or both |
| Documentaries | mp3 | mp4 |
| Interviews | mp3 | both (flexibility) |
| Shortform | mp3 | mp4 (visual content) |
| Other | mp3 | mp4 |

**Change type with third argument:**
```bash
./download.sh [URL] [category] mp4
./download.sh [URL] [category] mp3
./download.sh [URL] [category] both
```

---

## 🎨 Examples by Category

### Music
```bash
# Download music video as MP3
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=g1-46Nu3HxQ' music mp3

# Result: Music/2026-01-13 - A$AP ROCKY - HELICOPTER/
```

### Podcast
```bash
# Download podcast episode
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=PODCAST_ID' podcast mp3

# Result: Podcasts/2026-01-13 - Joe Rogan Experience #2000/
```

### Tutorial
```bash
# Download tutorial with both audio and video
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=TUTORIAL_ID' tutorial both

# Result: Tutorials/2026-01-13 - Python Full Course/
```

### Shortform
```bash
# Download TikTok video
./download.sh 'https://tiktok.com/@user/video/123' shortform-tiktok mp4

# Result: Shortform/TikTok/2026-01/2026-01-13 - funny video/

# Download by creator (auto-organizes)
./download.sh 'https://tiktok.com/@khaby.lame/video/456' shortform-creator mp4

# Result: Shortform/ByCreator/@khaby.lame/2026-01-13 - video/
```

---

## 🔍 Finding Your Content

### Browse by category
```bash
# List all music
ls Music/

# List all podcasts
ls Podcasts/

# List all TikToks from this month
ls Shortform/TikTok/2026-01/
```

### Search across all categories
```bash
# Find all videos about "Python"
find ~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2 -name "*Python*"

# Find all downloads from today
find ~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2 -name "$(date +%Y-%m-%d)*"
```

### Open in Finder
```bash
# Open Music category
open Music/

# Open specific download
open Music/2026-01-13*
```

---

## 💡 Pro Tips

### 1. **Use Shortcuts**
Create aliases in your shell:
```bash
# Add to ~/.zshrc or ~/.bashrc
alias dlm='~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2/download.sh'

# Then use:
dlm [URL] music mp3
dlm [URL] shortform-tiktok mp4
```

### 2. **Bulk Downloads**
Use yt-dlp directly for playlists:
```bash
# Download entire playlist to Music
yt-dlp -x --audio-format mp3 \
    -o "~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2/Music/%(upload_date)s - %(title)s/%(title)s.%(ext)s" \
    --write-info-json \
    [PLAYLIST_URL]
```

### 3. **Favorites Collection**
Create a Favorites folder in each category:
```bash
mkdir Music/Favorites
mkdir Podcasts/Favorites
mkdir Shortform/Favorites

# Copy favorites there manually
```

### 4. **Regular Cleanup**
```bash
# Find files older than 90 days
find Shortform -name "*.mp4" -mtime +90

# Delete after review
```

### 5. **Backup Strategy**
```bash
# Backup specific categories
rsync -av Music/ /backup/Music/
rsync -av Podcasts/ /backup/Podcasts/

# Or backup everything
rsync -av MediaVault_v2/ /backup/MediaVault_v2/
```

---

## 📚 Related Guides

- **Getting Started**: `START_HERE_FIRST.md`
- **Quick Start**: `QUICK_START.md`
- **Shortform Guide**: `SHORTFORM_GUIDE.md`
- **Shortform Quick Start**: `SHORTFORM_QUICKSTART.md`
- **Full Documentation**: `README.md`
- **Why v2 is Better**: `WHY_V2_IS_BETTER.md`

---

## 🎯 Summary

**9 main categories** for all your content:
1. Music
2. Podcasts
3. Tutorials
4. Entertainment
5. Educational
6. Documentaries
7. Interviews
8. **Shortform** (with 5 subcategories)
9. Other

**Every download automatically organized with:**
- ✅ Category folder
- ✅ Date prefix
- ✅ All related files together (video, audio, metadata, subtitles)
- ✅ Industry-standard structure

**Use the right category, and MediaVault v2 handles the rest!**

---

© 2026 MediaVault v2

---

### 🎥 6. Documentaries
**Use for**: Documentary films, docuseries, nature documentaries

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] documentary mp4
```

**Structure**:

```
Documentaries/
└── 2026-01-13 - Nature Documentary Name/
    ├── documentary.mp4
    ├── documentary.srt
    └── documentary.info.json
```

### 🗣️ 7. Interviews
**Use for**: Interviews, talks, discussions, Q&A sessions

**Command**:

```bash
./download.sh [URL] interview mp4
./download.sh [URL] interview mp3
```

**Structure**:
```
Interviews/
└── 2026-01-13 - Person Name Interview/
    ├── interview.mp4
    ├── interview.mp3 (if audio)
    └── interview.info.json
```

---

### 📱 8. Shortform
**Use for**: TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, viral clips, memes

**Commands**:
```bash
# By platform
./download.sh [URL] shortform-tiktok mp4
./download.sh [URL] shortform-reels mp4
./download.sh [URL] shortform-shorts mp4

# By creator (auto-organizes)
./download.sh [URL] shortform-creator mp4
```

**Structure (By Platform)**:
```
Shortform/
├── TikTok/2026-01/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - video title.mp4
├── Reels/2026-01/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - reel title.mp4
└── YouTubeShorts/2026-01/
    └── 2026-01-13 - short title.mp4
```

**Structure (By Creator)**:
```
Shortform/ByCreator/
├── @khaby.lame/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - video.mp4
├── @gordonramsay/
│   └── 2026-01-13 - recipe.mp4
└── @zendaya/
    └── 2026-01-13 - post.mp4
```

**Special Features**:
- ✅ Automatic monthly folders (prevents clutter)
- ✅ Creator-based organization option
- ✅ Perfect for bulk downloads

---

### 📦 9. Other
**Use for**: Everything else that doesn't fit above categories

**Command**:
```bash
./download.sh [URL] other mp4
```

**Structure**:
```
Other/
└── 2026-01-13 - Video Title/
    ├── video.mp4
    └── video.info.json
```

## 🎯 Quick Decision Guide

**"Where should this go?"**

| Content | Category |
|---------|----------|
| Music video, album, song | `music` |
| Podcast episode | `podcast` |
| How-to video, course | `tutorial` |
| Movie, TV show, comedy | `entertainment` |
| Lecture, academic talk | `educational` |
| Documentary film | `documentary` |
| Interview, discussion | `interview` |
| TikTok video | `shortform-tiktok` |
| Instagram Reel | `shortform-reels` |
| YouTube Short | `shortform-shorts` |
| Anything else | `other` |

---

## 📊 File Type Defaults

| Category | Default Type | Recommended Type |
|----------|--------------|------------------|
| Music | mp3 | mp3 (smaller) |
| Podcasts | mp3 | mp3 (audio only) |
| Tutorials | mp3 | mp4 or both |
| Entertainment | mp3 | mp4 |
| Educational | mp3 | mp4 or both |
| Documentaries | mp3 | mp4 |
| Interviews | mp3 | both (flexibility) |
| Shortform | mp3 | mp4 (visual content) |
| Other | mp3 | mp4 |

**Change type with third argument:**
```bash
./download.sh [URL] [category] mp4
./download.sh [URL] [category] mp3
./download.sh [URL] [category] both
```

---

## 🎨 Examples by Category

### Music
```bash
# Download music video as MP3
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=g1-46Nu3HxQ' music mp3

# Result: Music/2026-01-13 - A$AP ROCKY - HELICOPTER/
```

### Podcast
```bash
# Download podcast episode
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=PODCAST_ID' podcast mp3

# Result: Podcasts/2026-01-13 - Joe Rogan Experience #2000/
```

### Tutorial
```bash
# Download tutorial with both audio and video
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=TUTORIAL_ID' tutorial both

# Result: Tutorials/2026-01-13 - Python Full Course/
```

### Shortform
```bash
# Download TikTok video
./download.sh 'https://tiktok.com/@user/video/123' shortform-tiktok mp4

# Result: Shortform/TikTok/2026-01/2026-01-13 - funny video/

# Download by creator (auto-organizes)
./download.sh 'https://tiktok.com/@khaby.lame/video/456' shortform-creator mp4

# Result: Shortform/ByCreator/@khaby.lame/2026-01-13 - video/
```

---

## 🔍 Finding Your Content

### Browse by category
```bash
# List all music
ls Music/

# List all podcasts
ls Podcasts/

# List all TikToks from this month
ls Shortform/TikTok/2026-01/
```

### Search across all categories
```bash
# Find all videos about "Python"
find ~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2 -name "*Python*"

# Find all downloads from today
find ~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2 -name "$(date +%Y-%m-%d)*"
```

### Open in Finder
```bash
# Open Music category
open Music/

# Open specific download
open Music/2026-01-13*
```

---

## 💡 Pro Tips

### 1. **Use Shortcuts**
Create aliases in your shell:
```bash
# Add to ~/.zshrc or ~/.bashrc
alias dlm='~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2/download.sh'

# Then use:
dlm [URL] music mp3
dlm [URL] shortform-tiktok mp4
```

### 2. **Bulk Downloads**
Use yt-dlp directly for playlists:
```bash
# Download entire playlist to Music
yt-dlp -x --audio-format mp3 \
    -o "~/Desktop/MediaVault_v2/Music/%(upload_date)s - %(title)s/%(title)s.%(ext)s" \
    --write-info-json \
    [PLAYLIST_URL]
```

### 3. **Favorites Collection**
Create a Favorites folder in each category:
```bash
mkdir Music/Favorites
mkdir Podcasts/Favorites
mkdir Shortform/Favorites

# Copy favorites there manually
```

### 4. **Regular Cleanup**
```bash
# Find files older than 90 days
find Shortform -name "*.mp4" -mtime +90

# Delete after review
```

### 5. **Backup Strategy**
```bash
# Backup specific categories
rsync -av Music/ /backup/Music/
rsync -av Podcasts/ /backup/Podcasts/

# Or backup everything
rsync -av MediaVault_v2/ /backup/MediaVault_v2/
```

content.text:
Perfect! I've **added complete Shortform support** to MediaVault v2. Here's what you now have:

## 📱 NEW: Shortform Category Added

### Structure Created:
```
Shortform/
├── TikTok/2026-01/          ← TikTok videos (monthly)
├── Reels/2026-01/           ← Instagram Reels (monthly)
├── YouTubeShorts/2026-01/   ← YouTube Shorts (monthly)
├── Clips/2026-01/           ← Random clips/memes
├── Viral/2026-01/           ← Viral content
└── ByCreator/               ← Organized by username
    ├── @user1/
    └── @user2/
```

---

## 🚀 How to Use Shortform

### TikTok
```bash
./download.sh 'https://tiktok.com/@user/video/123' shortform-tiktok mp4
```
**Result**: `Shortform/TikTok/2026-01/2026-01-13 - video/`

### Instagram Reels
```bash
./download.sh 'https://instagram.com/reel/ABC/' shortform-reels mp4
```
**Result**: `Shortform/Reels/2026-01/2026-01-13 - reel/`

### YouTube Shorts
```bash
./download.sh 'https://youtube.com/shorts/ABC' shortform-shorts mp4
```
**Result**: `Shortform/YouTubeShorts/2026-01/2026-01-13 - short/`

### By Creator (Auto-organizes by username)
```bash
./download.sh [ANY_SHORTFORM_URL] shortform-creator mp4
```
**Result**: `Shortform/ByCreator/@username/2026-01-13 - video/`

---

## ✨ Special Shortform Features

1. **Auto-Monthly Folders**: Shortform videos automatically go into monthly folders (2026-01, 2026-02) to prevent clutter
2. **Platform Separation**: TikTok, Reels, and Shorts each have their own space
3. **Creator Collections**: Use `shortform-creator` to auto-organize by username
4. **Bulk Downloads**: Download entire creator's content at once
5. **Metadata Preserved**: Captions, likes, views all saved

---

## 📚 Documentation Created

### For You:
- **`SHORTFORM_QUICKSTART.md`** - 30-second quick start (read this first!)
- **`SHORTFORM_GUIDE.md`** - Complete guide with strategies & tips
- **`ALL_CATEGORIES.md`** - Reference for all 9 categories

### Updated:
- **`download.sh`** - Now supports all shortform categories
- **`START_HERE_FIRST.md`** - Updated with shortform info
- **`--help`** - Shows shortform commands

---

## 🎯 Complete Category List

You now have **9 main categories**:

| # | Category | Command | Use For |
|---|----------|---------|---------|
| 1 | Music | `music` | Songs, music videos |
| 2 | Podcasts | `podcast` | Podcast episodes |
| 3 | Tutorials | `tutorial` | How-to videos |
| 4 | Entertainment | `entertainment` | Movies, TV |
| 5 | Educational | `educational` | Lectures, talks |
| 6 | Documentaries | `documentary` | Documentary films |
| 7 | Interviews | `interview` | Interviews |
| 8 | **Shortform** | `shortform-*` | **TikTok, Reels, Shorts** |
| 9 | Other | `other` | Everything else |

**Shortform has 6 subcategories**: TikTok, Reels, YouTubeShorts, Clips, Viral, ByCreator

---

## 💡 Why Monthly Folders for Shortform?

Shortform videos pile up FAST:
- Average TikTok: 5-15 MB
- 100 videos: ~1 GB
- Without organization: chaos

**Monthly folders solve this**:
- ✅ Easy to browse by time period
- ✅ Simple cleanup (delete old months)
- ✅ Prevents one massive folder
- ✅ Scalable to thousands of videos

---

```bash
open Shortform/TikTok/2026-01/
```
